transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haanji. Hello, ji. Pulkit sir, good morning. Main Nikki baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Hmm, bas theek hai.
Executive: Ji sir, aapki service ke regarding baat karni thi. Sir, aapki profile pe ek mail aaya tha.
Customer: Haan na?
Executive: Kuch buyer ka jo hai na, unhone aapke against complaint kiya tha. Naira Garments karke, haan.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ye solve ho gaya hai sir?
Customer: Maine unka paisa wapas bhej diya.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Thoda sa na in cheezo ko hume avoid karna hota hai. Online kyuki ye ek baar lag jata hai na red tag, to fir problem create hoti hai.
Customer: Achha mere bhi kai jagah paise fase hue hai. IndiaMART chahe to kabhi dilwa de. Aur jaise hi kisi ka paisa ruka, actually ruka nahi wo to puri lambi baat hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo usse aapko koi matlab nahi hona. Lekin nahi, nahi sir, aisi baat nahi hai. kya hai ki sirf nahi, wo baat aapki sahi hai. Lekin aap log sirf unhi ka dhyan dete hai jo aapko. Hamara paisa to IndiaMART mein fasa hua hai. Waha par aapne koi karwai nahi ki abhi tak.
Executive: Pulkit sir, ek baat bataiye aap hamare paid client ho. Aapke saath hum aisa kyu karenge batao?
Customer: Nahi, main samajh chuka hu IndiaMART se. Ye mera last and final tha. Iske baad main kabhi IndiaMART ka app uninstall kar dunga. Kabhi zindagi mein IndiaMART ko paisa nahi dunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aapko pata hai kya conversation kya tha aur kya dikkat aa rahi thi hum dono ke beech mein?
Executive: Bilkul wo dekho sir. Nahi to fir aapki company mujhe subah se kal se aaj se leke 100 phone kar chuki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aapke us party ke 20,000 kha ke main koi crorepati baap ki aulad nahi ho jaunga.
Executive: Aapki baat sahi hai sir. Lekin kya hai na dekho buyer aur. Lekin aapki company itna matlab mujhe phone kar rahi hai jabki mere to lakh rupaye tak fase hue hai aapke yaha pe.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Wo baat sahi hai sir aur aap hamare liye bahut valuable ho. Dikkat ye hai na.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, mere ko koi valuable nahi rehna hai aapke liye. Ye to mera abhi waise bhi ye December mein mera khatam ho jayega aapse.
Executive: Ek baat bataiye Pulkit sir, aise pareshan hone se kuch hota hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi. Are baat pareshan hone ki nahi hai.
Customer: Hamare paas kisi party ka 20,000 ruk gaya uske liye aapki company ne kal se mujhe 10 baar phone kar diya.
Customer: Aur main mere se kai baar aapko 50 baar phone karta hu tab aapki company koi matlab ghanta tak ek kuch, kuch nahi ukhar pa rahi us party ka.
Customer: Aapko pata hai us party aur mere beech mein kya conversation hua hai, kya dikkat aayi thi, kis karan se kya hua?
Executive: Yaha pe to unhone hamare paas jo hai mail kiya hua hai Naira Garments ne.
Customer: Theek hai. Unhone mail kar diya wo free ho gaye. Unhone dekhiye jab koi jail deta hai na, to wo kya kehta hai meri galti nahi thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Lekin uski sunwai to dono taraf ki hoti hai na.
Executive: Sunwai isiliye to maine aapko phone kiya hai sir. Main aapko. Nahi aap ek tarfa baat karte hai. Sunwai kuch nahi hai. Aap log ek tarfa baat karte hai. Isiliye maine unka payment de diya hai. Mujhe koi baat nahi karni. Mera December mein pura ho jayega uske baad aap mujhe haath jod dena main aapko haath jod dunga. Theek hai?
Executive: Dekho aap hamare paid client ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's money stuck with IndiaMART.

- Received many calls regarding buyer complaint.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive stated customer is valuable.

- Executive mentioned the customer is a paid client.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, refund, paid client, money stuck
